com.stickycoding.Rokon
Class AudioStream

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.AudioStream

public class AudioStream
extends java.lang.Object

Handles a stream of sound, launched through RokonAudio. Each time a SoundFile is played it is given a unique AudioStream

Author:
Richard
